item.title: Acting head of FEMA leaves after short and troubled tenure
item.description: David Richardson, a former Marine Corps officer, is the second FEMA head to leave or be fired since May.

item.title: AI industry-backed super PAC targets New York Democrat in opening shot of midterms

item.title: Jeffrey Epstein victims' ad calls for files to be released, Trump urges GOP to vote for House measure

item.title: AI could be causing 'quiet time' in labor market, top Trump economic aide Hassett says
item.description: President Donald Trump has signed executive orders aimed at lowering regulatory barriers and encouraging the construction of AI infrastructure.
